casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jonathan E. BRUNSON 247P16-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Jonathan Eugene Brunson, for Brunson, Jonathan Eugene. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of October 2018 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
